detected_errors: State-update summaries inconsistency: poddisruptionbudget/default/cassandra-cluster ADDED inconsistency: 2 event(s) seen during reference run, but 4 seen during testing run
State-update summaries inconsistency: poddisruptionbudget/default/cassandra-cluster DELETED inconsistency: 1 event(s) seen during reference run, but 3 seen during testing run
bug_reproduction_test_plans/casskop-stal.test_config_content:
workload: reducepdb
actions:
- actionType: pauseAPIServer
  apiServerName: kind-control-plane3
  pauseScope: cassandracluster/default/cassandra-cluster
  trigger:
    definitions:
    - triggerName: trigger1
      condition:
        conditionType: onObjectUpdate
        resourceKey: cassandracluster/default/cassandra-cluster
        prevStateDiff: '{"spec": {"maxPodUnavailable": 4}}'
        curStateDiff: '{"spec": {"maxPodUnavailable": 1}}'
        occurrence: 1
      observationPoint:
        when: beforeAPIServerRecv
        by: kind-control-plane3
    expression: trigger1
- actionType: reconnectController
  controllerLabel: casskop-operator
  reconnectAPIServer: kind-control-plane3
  async: true
  waitBefore: 10
  trigger:
    definitions:
    - triggerName: trigger2
      condition:
        conditionType: onObjectCreate
        resourceKey: poddisruptionbudget/default/cassandra-cluster
        occurrence: 1
      observationPoint:
        when: afterAPIServerRecv
        by: kind-control-plane
    expression: trigger2
- actionType: resumeAPIServer
  apiServerName: kind-control-plane3
  pauseScope: cassandracluster/default/cassandra-cluster
  trigger:
    definitions:
    - triggerName: trigger3
      condition:
        conditionType: onTimeout
        timeoutValue: 20
    expression: trigger3
